评论概述: Well made jacket with odd flare

I purchased this for a funeral that I needed to attend.  After searching the stores with no luck I tried Amazon.  I found this and she fit perfectly after I had it dry cleaned. I did go up in size and I’m glad that I did. Once I lose the weight that I’ve gained I’ll order another color.
The material is good and the style is unique. There is a lining inside so it a fairly warm jacket. I would wear it if the weather is better 45-65 degrees.

I wanted to love this coat. I wanted to give it a 5 stars. However, it is not as well made as it could have been. The style is beautiful, but the fabric will catch everything that flies by it. If it were real wool that would have been cool. But maybe it would have been too stiff then. I've gotten so many compliments. I'm not disappointed that I purchased it though. I'm concerned though how long it will last.
Great quality, the picture doesn’t do justice, every time I wear it I get compliments

This coat not like the photo and seems different from other reviews I read. Overall it seems to be the right size, but it feels all wrong. I am a fit working woman, 5ft 2 160lbs and I usually get a large or an extra large because I have wide hips. This coat was far too long for me, the neck hole in the top is too large, the collar is not flattering, as the 2 triangles puffs they call a collar flap around in random directions, as there is no structure to hold the collar up and not enough fabric around the back of the neck. The hood feels like an afterthought and the strings come out of the side of the neck. It feels like polyester. The inner lining, which If I remember right, many reviewers said did not exist, is slick, bunchy, and ill fitting. The worst part is the sleeves. The part where they tucked in the elbows is bulky and feels awkward. because of this bunching I have no hope of wearing any kind of long sleeve underneath the jacket.  Honestly this feels like kind of jacket you get at a knock off store for $40 because nobody wanted it. I marked it at 3 stars instead of 1 because it generally looks like the photo and while being too long, it fits. This coat is a project and needs to be tailored. It is made for tall women, but I do not believe this would look flattering on anyone. I am returning it.

Thick and sturdy! Really love how it looks!. Sleeves are a bit wider than how it looks on picture but not in a bad way! Very much love this coat!
Got a black one as Christmas gift! Love it so much that bought the red!

I can NOT say enough things about my jacket, but i will say this - I have worn it several times in cold temperatures, (30 and under, snow, rain, ice etc) and it has kept me cozy warm (sometimes too warm!) while looking SO cute. It's silly, but there is something SO satisying about being so put together when it's freezing outside. You button this coat up and you are warm and fashionable. And, it does give cold weather Mary Poppins vibes, you can't go wrong. Truly, LOVE this jacket - it's also great because while it looks good when dressed up, a pair of jeans a t-shirt are also a cute outfit - this jacket is amazing. The lining is nice, the pockets are good, the buttons are nice but now that i have worn this jacket a bunch and love it, I will likely trade those buttons in for something nicer.  This jacket is cute, warm, and you WILL get a TON of compliments in it! I have been cozy warm having LONG conversations outside in 15 degree weather. (I live in TX, and while i visit the northeast often, and am originally from the northeast, safe to say, this coat is doing a lot of the work keeping me warm, it's not like i am some super strong resistant to cold badass- the coat does the work- It's a PROPER winter coat!)  Also, can we talk about how freaking amazing the price is? A jacket this warm, this cute? With a HOOD? Silly. Buy the jacket.
This coat is not a wool blend. It is a 100% polyester coat. It’s cute but it’s a cheap felt type fabric.

评论概述: As expected and it was good
评论详情: I ordered size small, I am 5'-3", and weight 135-137 lbs. I considered myself have weight. At the top area it is tight but not uncomfortable, it is fine and I okay with it because I knew if I ordered medium it will look big on me, so I am okay with the top area that it tight little bit and same with the waist area. About the sides, it is okay but I wish if drop down more but it is fine I can agree with it. For the length it is fine and I think the coat will look more good with high heels. The length good it help keep you warm. The material is fine, it is light not too much heavy and give warmth at the same time which good to me it makes movement easier. Overall, it is looks very nice and the style is good. I ordered black color, size small. I am glad I did not  order medium because it will look loose at the top and big. The arms are good and have plenty of room. I would say make sure in measurements because it is very crucial, it make difference in the way you look in the coat. I am very okay with the order and pleased with the result.  I also received the coat without damage and it was clean and perfectly put in. Thank you hope this help.
I got the red and it is not red, more like a faded red going into pink, runs large also.

Fabric is just awful. Rather than a nice weighted worsted wool it feels like Middle-School-Art-Project-Felt.  It hangs terribly. It moves awkwardly.  The lining is some kind of really cheap satin. Feels plasticky. Wrinkly. Not at all smooth or soft. Not attached properly to exterior fabric. Pulls in places. Does not move well with exterior fabric.  The lining sticks out of the cuff when you put your arm in the sleeves. You end up having to tuck it back in. Why was it not stitched down?  The edges of the fabric are stitched so thickly and awkwardly it looks and feels like it was made in Home Ec 101 sewing class by a 13 year old.  I was looking for a stylish, off the beaten path fitted jacket that had some level of femininity in a masculine world. I like the unusual design and I truly believe that this coat made by a real and experienced tailor using higher quality materials is something that could be very beautiful and I would be willing to pay more for.  If you think “well, it’s within my budget and it doesn’t have to be too perfect” you will be very disappointed. This coat is unwearable. It’s embarrassing to be seen in. It looks and feels just awful! I do not recommend. I’m thankful for the Amazon Try-Before-You-Buy policy. I wore this only long enough to take the photos. See for yourself.
The fit was great, almost like it was tailored for me.
I opened the package and the buttons fell off- I cannot believe these other reviews. SMH

It felt awful light  when I received it, but put it on and was pleasantly surprised.  The size chart indicated I should order a medium but ordered the large as I am wide in the shoulders and it fit perfectly.

评论概述: I've never had so many compliments!

After measuring myself carefully, I fell square into a size medium. However, when it arrived and I tried it on, I was swimming in it! So I returned it and ordered a small. The medium arrived neatly folded in a ziploc bag and boxed. The small arrived chaotically stuffed in a plastic bag. I pulled it out to discover a bunch of hair inside the collar. Ew, gross!! Got the lint roller out before trying it on. It fits, so I'm keeping it, but really turned off by the hair!! Blech!

评论概述: Vampy goth vibes and I love it!
评论详情: Ordered an XL so I can comfortably fit chunky sweaters underneath. Even with a big sweater it still comes in and gives me a defined waist. I personally love the vampire/goth vibes it gives. But if you're looking for a very normal jacket this isn't it. I agree with some of the reviews that the hood is MASSIVE but I don't view that as a problem. If my hair is in a bun or I'm wearing a hat I can still have the hood up. It's not the heaviest coat but I don't get out much in the winter, so I'm not too worried. Overall, very happy with this coat

评论概述: Great for Normal or Business Casual
评论详情: What I like about this coat is how well it fits my body type. I have a bottle shape that is more on the thicker side, so trying to find a coat that compliments my body type is hard to find. This coat does not hide my shape, and that's what I have been looking for in a coat. It doesn't make me look bigger or bulgy in anyway. It looks and feels like high quality material, and it is really comfortable.

评论用户: The item looks like it is good material except it is put together poorly.  Can’t button the top and the bottom is huge.  It looks like a bulky ballerina skirt and the sleeves are awful

评论详情: The cut of this coat is so flattering. It is a little tighter around the bust, but the unique design means you can leave the top buttons undone and it actually enhances the silhouette, especially when worn with a scarf or shawl underneath. Well put together. It won't hold up to a very frigid day, but I have worn it comfortably with a long scarf and sweater at below freezing. A perfect early winter or spring jacket, or winter dress coat if you won't be outside too long. Totally worth the price.

Obviously not the best quality wool, as it is not as soft as other wool coast I have, but it looks absolutely great and is still quite comfortable. Functionally warm, and long. I am 5 feet and the coat hits me at mid-calf. The hood is less functional and the draw strings are only for looks, but still kept my ears warm. Also, this particular coat came with the lining down one of the sleeves sewn in twisted which made it difficult to put on. But, I sew and was able to easily correct this issue by unstitching the lining at the cuff and re-sewing. Surely this would not cost much for someone to have it repaired by a professional if one doesn't know how to sew it themselves.
It looks amazing, I’ve had compliments from strangers. It fits well, good string is useless.
This jacket never fails to get me compliments anywhere I go. I fits me in all the right places and is very warm. Like I have to turn off the car heat warm.
It runs small so I’m glad I sized up, but this is a well made and eye catching piece.
It's truly a beautiful piece. It fit perfectly all around. Makes you feel sexy and cute. Love the material. Got it in perfect timing.
